ChangeToken.description: The value returned by the most recent call to GetChangeToken.

MetricName.description: A friendly name or description for the metrics for this Rule. The name can contain only alphanumeric characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9); the name can't contain whitespace. You can't change the name of the metric after you create the Rule.

Name.description: A friendly name or description of the Rule. You can't change the name of a Rule after you create it.
